原始電文:
0200723A4001084180021666666612345678905610000000010010000327110332000981180332032703286011040014000980      000000000012123036123456     000012345678900000100000028000288

MTI:
0200

Bitmap:
7   2   3   A   4   0   0   1   0   8   4   1   8   0   0   2
0111001000111010010000000000000100001000010000011000000000000010

代表電文帶有下列這些 bit 的資料
2,3,4,7,11,12,13,15,18,32,37,42,48,49,63

Data:

2	LLVAR			n .. 19		Len: 16, Data: [6666661234567890]
3					n 6			Data: [561000]
4					n 12		Data: [000001001000]
7	MMDDhhmmss		n 10		Data: [0327110332]
11					n 6			Data: [000981]
12	hhmmss			n 6			Data: [180332]
13	MMDD			n 4			Data: [0327]
15	MMDD			n 4			Data: [0328]
18					n 4			Data: [6011]
32	LLVAR			n .. 11		Len: 04, Data: [0014]
37					an 12		Data: [000980      ]
42					ans 15		Data: [000000000012123]
48	LLLVAR			an .. 999	Len: 036, Data: [123456     0000123456789000001000000]
49					an 3		Data: 280
63	LLLVAR			ans .. 999	Len: 002, Data: [88]
